body: Graphics systems/hardware, color models, transformations, projections, clipping, hidden line/surface removal, aliasing, parametric curves/surfaces, 3D modeling animation. CMPSC 457CMPSC 457 Computer Graphics Algorithms I (3)Concepts and techniques needed to draw geometrical objects with a discrete device: Coordinate systems, clipping, curves and regions, geometric transformations, parallel and projective projections, hidden line and surface removal, animation.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPSC122 ; MATH 220)(Additional Attributes: NONE)
contentHtml: Graphics systems/hardware, color models, transformations, projections, clipping, hidden line/surface removal, aliasing, parametric curves/surfaces, 3D modeling animation. CMPSC 457CMPSC 457 Computer Graphics Algorithms I (3)Concepts and techniques needed to draw geometrical objects with a discrete device: Coordinate systems, clipping, curves and regions, geometric transformations, parallel and projective projections, hidden line and surface removal, animation.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPSC122 ; MATH 220)(Additional Attributes: NONE)
title: CMPSC 457: Computer Graphics Algorithms
